comments.author: Husires
comments.body: You must move this topic to the local board since the platform is local and cannot be used outside Bangladesh.They have a topic where you can talk in the local language and tell people about their experience with the platform, but since I read somewhere that Bitcoin is banned in Bangladesh, I don't know how this platform will work unless it is just a P2P market, and here you will need more to gain trust.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Probably another scam site created by OP. It looks like the old ones now has lots of negative reviews and isn't catching him anymore victims. Beware folks.QuoteDomain: dollar2exchange.comRegistrar: DropCatch.com 1236 LLCRegistered On: 2023-11-22Expires On: 2024-11-22Updated On: 2023-11-22This scammer seems to be mentally challenged as well.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 03, 2023, 11:43:51 PMThis scammer seems to be mentally challenged as well.FLAG was supported, apparently betting that Bengali users would be more willing to try the service (due to the local language and Bitcoin banned there) than international users.Regardless of the reasons, this is a scam and I do not advise anyone to use the service.
